column4: hello, I have a cron job that keeps sending me mail even though I appended >& /dev/null to the end of it's line in crontab and restarted crond
>& and &> is bash-syntax. cron uses sh, not bash. The equivalent for sh is: >/dev/null 2>&1
oh thanks, I didn't know the difference, I'll try that :)
thank you very much, that seems to of worked
